newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: RUGBY UNION-IRELAND VERSUS AUSTRALIA MATCH BROUGHT FORWARD.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-IRELAND VERSUS AUSTRALIA MATCH BROUGHT FORWARD.

text.p: Ireland's rugby international against Australia at Landsdowne Road has been brought forward one week to November 23, the Irish Rugby Football Union said on Wednesday.
The change in date was made in response to a request from the Welsh Rugby Union for one of the six matches that had been allocated to Ireland for the Wallabies tour.
Ireland surrendered the fixture between Ireland A and the Wallabies on November 26 and in return will have a match against the All Blacks next season.
